description: First floor and roof side extensions, ground floor side/rear infill extension, removal of two chimney stacks and alteration to rear ground floor elevations replacing existing door and window and alteration to window of existing rear roof extension
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following: Revised Proposed Ground and First Floor Plan drawing no.020F, Proposed Loft and Roof Floor Plan drawing no.021F, Proposed Elevation drawing no.030E and Proposed Section drawing no.040E
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those detailed in the approved materials schedule listed under condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D1, D2 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2019) - section 12
| No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan 2013 and National Planning Policy Framework 2019 - Section 12 - Achieving well-designed places.
| No new openings to the extension notwithstanding approved plans as per Condition 2, shall be incorporated without prior written confirmation from the Local Planning Authority.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D1, D4 and of the London Plan 2021, policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1 and 2.10 Adopted Development (Core) Strategy 2012
